recipes.title: Ham Loaves
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, combine the bread crumbs, eggs and milk. Crumble pork and ham over mixture and mix well. Shape into 12 ovals, using 1 cup of mixture for each.                                                                                            Place in an ungreased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Combine the brown sugar, water, vinegar and mustard; pour over loaves.                                                                                            Bake, uncovered, at 350째 for 1 hour 15 minutes or until a thermometer reads 160째, basting every 15-20 minutes. Place loaves on a serving platter; drizzle with pan juices.                                        Yield: 12 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Ham Loaves in  Taste of HomeFebruary/March 1995, p19                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 630 calories, 30 g fat (11 g saturated fat), 166 mg cholesterol, 1,362 mg sodium, 54 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 35 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, combine the bread crumbs, eggs and milk. Crumble pork and ham over mixture and mix well. Shape into 12 ovals, using 1 cup of mixture for each.
Place in an ungreased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.
Combine the brown sugar, water, vinegar and mustard; pour over loaves.
Bake, uncovered, at 350째 for 1 hour 15 minutes or until a thermometer reads 160째, basting every 15-20 minutes.
Place loaves on a serving platter; drizzle with pan juices.
